front.head: Written at Tunbridge-Wells. To the Right Honourable the Lady Barbara North, occasion'd by some of the Company's saying they would go to Faint-Fair, and act a Play.

lg.l: some few Hours we must repair,
To act, like , in the Fair:
And, as our Stage is of a Piece
And, since it helps the Poet's Art,
Wonder not, fair One, that we sue,
The may be play'd by you.
